Subject: [Feature Request] Add Date/Time(CLIENT UTC) as a field in Content Aware Report
Description:
Current ticket is a copy of a support case created on 21-Jul-2022 and that didn't get migrated to Netwrix Support Portal.

Initial Description: 
We try to use UTC as much as possible in our detections and triages.
While checking the details in the Content Aware Report we noticed the lack of Client and Server time in UTC. As we use the SIEM we confirmed that this information is available in the server/ alerts logs. Can this be included as an option in the Admin UI?
What_We_Know__c: The customer would like to have the Client and Server time in UTC for the Content Aware Report
Next_Steps__c: R&D confirmed that this feature is part of EPP Unify roadmap
